page.title: 04CLUBS IN FORTON
page.content: The{CUB SCOUTS}meet on Tuesday night at Hollins Lane Forton at 6-30 .Akela is Christine Dickenson .The assistants are Linda Dewhurst.Viv Chapman and Mrs Proctor.The neckerchieves are yellow with a black border . A cub pack is divided into groups called sixes,different colours.My mum is ADC which isshort for Assistant District Commissianer for Lonsdale cubs,Forton is part of Lonsdale District.Cubs do lots of badges: cook,artist,gardener,athlete,hobbies, first aid.My dad used to be a scout leader with Forton.The HQ used to be in an old tin hut in Wallace Lane near the garden centre at a house called the Manse when Mrs Whincap lived there.
